alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 07 at 10:29AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Colorado, including Bent and Prowers Counties. * WHEN...From 2 PM MDT this afternoon through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Monsoon moisture combined with post-frontal upslope winds will increase the risk of heavy rain producing thunderstorms and flash flooding across the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
